Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory184.png'}
{1: 'Constellia Water Park'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Commandant, are you ready? This is the final stage!', 4: '1'}
{2: '(Take a deep breath)', 3: '9'}
{3: "A balance beam, floating buoys... behind you lie the challenges you've already cleared, and beneath your feet, the bridge stretches high over a massive pool."}
{2: 'Staff Member A', 3: "Looks like today's two challengers are fired up and ready to roll!"}
{2: 'Staff Member B', 3: 'Next up is a challenge that calls for spot-on calculations, a smooth running start, and flawless bouncing...'}
{2: 'Staff Member B', 3: "This is the track's ultimate showdown!"}
{1: '1', 3: "Ayla sets herself in a running stance but stays put, like she's waiting for the go-ahead."}
{2: '(Nod)', 3: '18', 4: "Alright, I'm all set too.", 5: '19'}
{3: 'Ayla gives a quick blink and flashes an OK sign.'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "Excellent! Let's go!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Still, you find it curious—there\'s only a suspended bridge ahead, so what exactly is this "bouncing" test supposed to be?'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "Whoa! It's so slippery! How are we supposed to run on this?!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'She takes her first step and almost loses her balance.'}
{3: 'After a few quick steps, you see the truth: the bridge is soaked, giving you practically no grip at all.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: "It's tougher than I imagined, but that only makes it more thrilling!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'She looks toward the finish line on the far side, her eyes shining with excitement.'}
{3: 'It feels like a spell has taken hold—the center of the bridge starts folding in, leaving only the two takeoff platforms at each end.'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Sure enough, we have to leap all the way to the other side.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Commandant, grab my hand!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'You want to jump together?', 3: '35', 4: "(Take Ayla's offered hand)", 5: '35'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "If we pull this off, Commandant, you're buying me ice cream!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'One, two, three, ready...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'You call out in unison and spring toward the platform on the other side.'}
{3: 'Your hands are clasped tight as they swing into the air, and your toes nearly brush the edge of the finish line.'}
{3: 'But a moment later, you feel that all-too-familiar slippery sensation beneath your feet.'}
{3: 'Your balance shifts backward. Before you can react, a soft body approaches you.'}
{3: 'She quickly grabs your hand, which almost slips free in the sudden loss of balance, and your interlocked fingers never let go.'}
{2: '(Tighten your grip even more)', 3: '53', 4: '(Am I really going to fall?)', 5: '53'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{3: 'Splash!'}
{3: 'A wave of dizziness overwhelms you. The sun-baked air is scorching, and the blistering wind burns your ears.'}
{3: 'Then, as you hit the water, its cool rush closes in from every direction, enveloping you completely.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory537.jpg'}
{2: 'Staff Member A', 3: "It's such a pity—our two challengers ended up losing to the biggest, baddest Slip-And-Slide Disaster in history..."}
{3: 'You come up for air alongside Ayla, and the instant you break the surface, the staff delivers a deflating announcement.'}
{3: 'Of course, the staff is not just standing there. He presses a switch that triggers an inflatable cushion under the pool, sending you to shore.'}
{2: 'What a twisted name for that stage.', 3: '67'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory184.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Huh? This totally gives off a nonsensical gag-manga vibe!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: "And today's challenge is a total success!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Could this bridge be our very own Magpie Bridge, Commandant?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Magpie Bridge?', 3: '74'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: "Commandant, don't you know? Today is the day Altair and Vega meet!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: 'The bridge we need to cross together is missing a chunk right in the middle...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Although, sometimes a little imperfection makes things that much more beautiful...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: 'But today, I won\'t stand for this so-called "art form."', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: 'If you go across the broken magpie bridge by yourself, the blessing might just stop working.', 4: '1'}
{3: "Ayla's spontaneous comment is so typical of her. But you understand her point."}
{2: 'Your clothes are soaked... Is that all right?', 3: '83'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "No problem at all! I'm wearing this summer-themed coating on purpose.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'With that said, she raises the hem of her clothes and lightly wrings it out with both hands.'}
{3: 'Water splashes into the pool, and Ayla exhales a soft sigh of relief.'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: '【kuroname】, does it still bother you?', 4: '1'}
{2: "Yeah... I'm still a bit frustrated about it.", 3: '89', 4: 'I want to give it another shot.', 5: '89'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: "Don't feel down! Today is really special, and I've got a unique surprise just for you, 【kuroname】!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'What kind of surprise?', 3: '92', 4: 'Unique, huh?', 5: '92'}
{3: 'Before you can blink, she moves in with a warm smile, slipping her arms around your waist.'}
{3: 'The summer air, mingled with the softness of her hair, wraps around this moment.'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "Take a quick breather, then let's tackle this challenge again, 【kuroname】.", 4: '1'}
